items.sentence: Tom and Mary were seated next to each other in the back seat of John\'s car.
Frankly speaking, I don\'t think you have what it takes to become a teacher.
Even though Tom tried to explain it to Mary, she still couldn\'t understand.
Everybody knew that Tom wasn\'t going to do what he said he was going to do.
Tom didn\'t do well enough on the driver\'s test to get a driver\'s license.
